verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: puts] [ARG1: his extraordinary gamble with North Korea] [ARG2: to the test] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] , [ARGM-PRD: sitting for unprecedented talks with the rogue kingdom 's despotic leader] .
[ARG1: President Donald Trump] puts his extraordinary gamble with North Korea to the test on Tuesday , [V: sitting] [ARGM-PRP: for unprecedented talks with the rogue kingdom 's despotic leader] .
